core_principles: Precision over Decoration: Every pixel must serve the data.
Dark Mode Native: Designed for 12-hour shifts in low light.
Crystal Interface: Glassmorphism used for hierarchy, not just aesthetics.
Tactile Data: Interactive charts that feel responsive and alive.

typography.pairing_rules: Use Manrope for all headings. Use Inter for UI labels and long text. Use JetBrains Mono for ALL data points, table cells, and code snippets.

usage_rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use #0B1120 or #020617.
Use Cyan (#06B6D4) for primary actions and active states.

bento_grid_rules: Sidebar: Fixed width (260px) or collapsed icon rail.
Widgets: Use col-span-12 md:col-span-6 lg:col-span-4 for standard widgets.
Charts: Use col-span-12 md:col-span-8 for main charts to ensure readability.

buttons.primary: bg-cyan-500 hover:bg-cyan-400 text-slate-900 font-bold rounded-md shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(6,182,212,0.3)] transition-all
buttons.secondary: bg-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-700 text-slate-200 border border-slate-700 rounded-md

cards.style: bg-slate-900/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 rounded-lg shadow-xl

inputs.style: bg-slate-950/50 border-slate-700 focus:border-cyan-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-cyan-500 rounded-md text-slate-200 placeholder:text-slate-600

charts.style: Use transparent backgrounds. Custom Tooltip is MANDATORY (glassmorphic dark tooltip).

visual_enhancers.textures: Use a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) on the main background to reduce banding.

motion.micro_interactions: Buttons scale down (0.98) on click. Cards lift (-4px) on hover.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is slate-200 or lighter on dark backgrounds.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible cyan ring offset-2 ring-2 on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALLATION: Run 'npm install recharts framer-motion lucide-react clsx tailwind-merge' immediately.
2. CLEANUP: Delete App.css contents. Reset index.css to use the provided color variables.
3. FONTS: Import Manrope and JetBrains Mono from Google Fonts in index.css.
4. COMPONENTS: Create a 'GlassCard' component that encapsulates the card style rules.
5. CHARTS: Create a reusable 'ChartContainer' that handles responsive sizing and the custom tooltip.
6. FILE UPLOAD: Use a dashed border zone with a glow effect on hover for the dropzone.
7. DASHBOARD: Implement the Sidebar + Main Content layout. Do not use a top nav for the main dashboard actions.
8. FORECASTING: Use a distinct visual style (e.g., dashed lines in charts) to differentiate actual data from forecasted data.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories (especially sponsor logos) = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable
Create new components that match the style and conventions of existing components when needed
Examine existing components to understand the project's component patterns before creating new ones
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...)
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...})
Use sonner for toasts. Sonner component are located in /app/src/components/ui/sonner.tsx
